item.title: Blog reboot
item.description: Blogging in general seems like it has taken a hit, and this blog is no exception. However, I would like to do my part to keep the Indie-web alive, and the first part of contributing is to actually write things, so I figure I might as well try to reboot this blog. Lately I’ve gotten way into org mode and doom emacs, so it felt pretty natural to use that as my vehicle for returning to blogging.
